SELECT DISPLAY_DT
,IFNULL(MAX(CASE WHEN CHANNEL_NM = REPLACE(#{item.CHANNEL_NM}, '|dot|', '.') THEN CNT END), 0) AS '${item.CHANNEL_NM}'
FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(SI.END_LOG_DT, INTERVAL 1 MINUTE), '%H:%i') DISPLAY_DT, IRS.* FROM targetai.STAT_INFO SI LEFT OUTER JOIN targetai.IB_REAL_STAT IRS ON (SI.SEQ = IRS.SEQ) WHERE
SI.CREATE_DT > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') AND SI.CREATE_DT < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00')
) T GROUP BY DISPLAY_DT
